summary: The document is a memorandum detailing the favorable closure of an investigation into Manuel Marti, a US citizen born in San Juan, Puerto Rico, in 1946. It references AR 604-10 as the basis for the case closure, following a review of the subject's dossier and derogatory information. Originally classified as UNCLASSIFIED, the document was released with deletions on 03/07/95 and is part of the DOD-Affiliated Personnel Incident Investigations series.
key_findings: The investigation into Manuel Marti concluded with a favorable outcome.
AR 604-10 was cited as the authority for the case closure.
The document, part of the DOD-Affiliated Personnel Incident Investigations, was released with deletions in 1995.
A review of derogatory information preceded the favorable closure of the case.
